resources.string: Toggle the top bottom to enable/disable the auto discovery feature. If this feature is disabled you will need to connect to the device via the IP address.
This is your device local IP address. If you don\'t see your device into the device list you can connect manually via this IP address.
This is your name and it will appear near your device info in the discovery list. To change your name tap the button below.
There is no active file transfer that is currently running.
WARNING! The current active file transfer will be force closed. Please ensure that your data was transfered.
